titles.title: A bill to reinstate certain mining claims in the State of Alaska.
A bill to reinstate certain mining claims in the State of Alaska.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill identifies specified mining claims in Alaska that qualify for certain relief under the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1993, and, accordingly, grants claimholders the opportunity to cure defects affecting such claims with respect to any prior period during which: (1) either the defects existed, or (2) there was a failure to pay claim maintenance fees.
